name: An Unfinished Project
description:
An unfinished project in the form of an ARPG, complete with:

  • Talent system
  • Skill system (Item-based)
  • Inventory & equipment
  • Randomised loot
  • Unique prefix & suffix item effects
  • Dynamic weather
  • Dynamic day/night cycle
  • Levels & attributes
  • Limited monster variety
  • Randomly generated levels
  • Dynamic save system
  • Limited key rebinding
  • Complex pathing and collision system
  • Other things

A victim of the all too familiar feature creep, this project is unlikely to be finished.

You're welcome to give it a try, but please be aware that there are many bugs, crashes, and half-implemented systems. Also, resolutions other than 3440x1440 & 1920x1080 are untested.

If you have any questions about the project, please feel free to ask!

Basic gameloop:

Navigate your surroundings to find the portal to the next floor.
Equip unique loot and skill tomes, then defeat enemies to level up.
Loot & enemies gain strength as you clear more floors.

Undocumented controls:

Left Mouse - Attack
Right Mouse - Use secondary (EG. Block with shield)
F12 - Developer menu

See the options menu for the rest of the controls & to rebind keys.
